listitem.para: Fill in the form field Full name Your surname, name and second name, with space, for example: "Иванов Иван Иванович";
Choose the theme of lab (conformity can be not total);
The description of theme will appear lower, the list of exercises as a buttons, and in window of program - the list of exercises as a text.
Press the exercise-button to open the book of problems at page of that exercise (in some cases - text of exercise). In the window of program you can see the description of exercise.

warning.title: Warning!
warning.para: The comments in the description of exercise in TaskGen have a higher priority than comments in the book of problems!

warning.title: Warning!
warning.para: Not at all labs you need to complete all 10 exercises - you should ask about it your teacher.

formalpara.title: Updates of exercises database:
formalpara.para: New file taskgen.sqlite you should copy with replacement the old one in the working directory of program. In a virtual machine this way /home/student/.config/taskgen/. You can check updates of database at http://sites.google.com/site/roman7yagodin at section "Программы и компоненты".

itemizedlist.title: What is not implemented (but in plans):

listitem.para: Review of exercises just in TaskGen (требуется перевод задачников в удобный для машинной обработки вид, предположительно в связке DocBook XML + SVG + MathML).
Разное количество задач по разным темам, возможность задания количества задач, которые требуется решить, в формате "N из M".
Тематическая привязка по каждой задаче (сейчас - по разделу).
A special hints for some difficult exercises.
Integrated handbooks of the Physics and the Maths.
Update the database of exercises with internet-connection.
